title: Start your day here: Trump's latest lawsuit; Park Service may get its first Native director; and more
content:
1. Start your day here: Trump's latest lawsuit; Park Service may get its first Native director; and more  NPR
  2. Global National: Oct. 18, 2021 | Trudeau apologizes to BC First Nation for ignoring invitations  Global News
  3. Canada's Trudeau apologizes for skipping remembrance for Indigenous school victims  NPR
  4. Sharp words and cautious optimism: Trudeau's visit to Tk'emlúps te Secwe̓pemc draws mixed reaction  CBC.ca
  5. Trudeau visits Tk'emlúps te Secwe̓pemc to apologize for Truth and Reconciliation Day snub  CTV News Vancouver
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 一日の始まりはここから。トランプ大統領の最新の訴訟、パークサービスに初のネイティブディレクターが誕生するかもしれない、など。
从这里开始你的一天。特朗普的最新诉讼；公园管理局可能会得到其第一个土著主任；以及更多
